snippet.title: SAGA 2: Pirate Adventure walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Adventure International)
snippet.description:
The second adventure in Scott Adams Graphic Adventure series, Pirate Adventure (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/pirate-adventure) was the second graphics adventure game from Scott Adams, published by Adventure International in 1982 for the Apple ][.

The game requires a lot of disk access, so I sped up the emulator. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - wikipedia
Walkthrough - www.ifarchive.org
